price: 21. Boye basili kozua banzambe oyo bakosekuisa bawa na mabele?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
